useCase.name: User Research and CMS Implementation
useCase.description: Use case describing the process of conducting user research and implementing a CMS
useCase.trigger: User research and CMS implementation initiation

mainSequence.step: Employee requests CMS Strategy
URT defines research objectives
URT communicates research needs for CMS
URT conducts usability testing with CMS
CMS provides feedback data to URT
URT analyzes user data
URT recommends CMS features based on analysis
TT evaluates technical feasibility
TT presents technical constraints to URT
URT adjusts recommendations based on technical input
URT documents high-level CMS strategy
Docs creates training materials
Docs provides CMS strategy documentation to Employee
Employee reviews documentation
Employee requests clarification if needed
URT provides additional details to Employee
Employee initiates CMS implementation based on strategy
TT configures CMS according to strategy
CMS confirms completion
TT notifies CMS setup completion to Employee
